name: Feudalia
description:
If you like card games, you can't stay out of the Feudalia universe.

Feudalia is a deck building and resource management card game.
Play now and take on the role of a feudal lord master of the new kingdom territories.
In Feudalia, you will control three fiefdoms, with a village in each of them. Thanks to your cards, you will have a population of vassals that will provide you with resources and money, with this you can grow your villages, increase your population, specialize vassals and hire great teachers to unlock special abilities.

In addition of trying to have the most prosperous fiefdoms, you can discover how to build the cathedral that the king claims for his own benefit and glory.
In Feudalia, your vassals will evolve, acquiring new skills and making your fiefdoms progress. But be careful! You will not be able to get all the specialties. Discover one of the best strategic card games and play it!
